title: 2 Dope Queens
resume: A series of four hour-long specials taped before a live audience at Brooklyn’s Kings Theatre. The show features the fun, fearless queens dishing on “Cocoa Khaleesis,” dating white baes, sex, New York-living, the best borough for pizza and more.
